testcase.classname: Guru99 login and create telecom project
testcase.name: telecom project and add customers test scenario
testcase.system-out: Given user is present on login page.........................................passed And title of login page is GTPL Bank Home Page..............................passed When user enters userID and password........................................passed And user clicks on login button.............................................passed Then user is on home page...................................................passed And user clicks on telecom project..........................................passed And user clicks on add customer.............................................passed When user selects background check as done and enters billing address.......passed And user again comes on telecom projects homepage...........................passed
